title: Vengeful Spirit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Find your Slayer: You may use this ability once during the day to find out who was responsible for your death.
From there, you can attempt a Spiteful Retribution. Spiteful Retribution has a cooldown of one night, but at night you attack your killer. This begins at a Basic, and ramps up by one damage level every night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become a Restful Spirit by slaying your killer.

desc:
Post 2322
*What do you think happens to those who die with unfinished business? They continue to linger, until that business is finished*
